example.name: unspecified spoils
example.text: Both Ford and GM badly need a luxury brand *trace* *trace* to combat new competition from the Japanese in the European and U.S. markets.

example.name: ARG2
example.text: They combatted over food, territory, and mates until the snow ran red with the blood of the fallen.
example.arg: until the snow ran red with the blood of the fallen.
